db:abstract.db:para: Analyzing a raw audio stream using the FFTReal library.

db:article.db:programlisting:
include(spectrum.pri)
TEMPLATE = subdirs
# Ensure that library is built before application CONFIG += ordered
!contains(DEFINES, DISABLE_FFT): SUBDIRS += 3rdparty/fftreal SUBDIRS += app
TARGET = spectrum
EXAMPLE_FILES += \ README.txt \ TODO.txt
